title: Care-App
description:
Fall and emergency detection mobile system for the elderly,
using Bluetooth beacons. This is the implementation of my thesis work; it's an enhanced version of VitaAssist, a group project from my Masters.

     Only tested on Android phones but it should work on iPhone, too.

title: kyokuFind
description:
Desktop music library application for Windows

     with a focus on search functionality, using Apache Lucene as the IR library.

      Also has a "music discovery" feature implemented using the Last.fm API (RIP).
      Final project for the "Search Engine Technology" class of my Master.

title: ihbi-project
description:
Health promotion social app developed for the 
 Younger Women's Wellness After Cancer (YYWWAC) program for my "Advanced Topic" class. I worked on the Geolocation and Facebook data presentation parts.

title: karu
description:
Keyboard emulator for your computer using an Android smartphone. Client-server architecture.

      Made this so I could remotely control the media player on my laptop (I don't use Spotify).

      Currently it supports media keys only.

title: peeky
description:
Takes a timestamped picture using your laptop's webcam every five minutes

    and then uploads it to an FTP server of your choosing so you can have a look.

    Made this to make sure my laptop didn't get stolen when I left it at the library lol.
